test_requirements.description: address book object constructor, can receive optional parameters: name, address, email, phone and save them as attributes, returns an object with the following methods: __str__, __repr__, add_contacts, get_user_details, display_contacts, search_contact, modify_contact
return a string with this format: [Name: {} | Address: {} | Email: {} | Phone: {}]
return a string with this format: [Name: {} | Address: {} | Email: {} | Phone: {}]
this function adds any contacts to the address book database
this function asks for Contact's Full Name,Address,Email Address,Phone Number. saves the result in the object's contacts in dict format and return the result. if an error occurs it is raised
this function prints all records from the database, if the database is not accessible or empty, a message for no records is printed

if the database is not accessible or empty, a message for no records is printed otherwise this function asks for a name to search, if an error occur it is printed, for any name that is found the contact info is printed, if none are found an appropriate message is printed
